Package com.randi.dyned.model

Interface Summary
ConfigurationListener A listener to notify when ConfigurationFactory done parsing.
ContentListener A listener to notify when done content processing.
 

Class Summary
AudioDownload Manage and keep records of downloaded Audio for dialogs and questions.
AvatarDownload Manage and keep records of downloaded Avatar video files.
ComprehensionItem A class that represent object of question in Comprehension.
ComprehensionManager Controls the view of ComprehensionScreen
ConfigurationFactory Configuration factory parsing from XML file appconfig.xml.
ContentLoader A thread class to download Audio and Avatar video files.
DownloadAndSaveFile A thread class that manage the sequence of downloading files and save it to device internal memories.
GrammarItem A class that represent object of questions in Grammar.
GrammarManager Controls the view of GrammarScreen
LessonItem A class that represent object of Lesson.
Resources Resource class for API's url and file location.
Variables Configuration variables.
